ctx: intros f a b x e Hintx Heqa Heqb.
exceptions.exn: In environment V : NormedModule R_AbsRing f : R -> V a, b : R x : V e : R Hintx : a <= b Heqa : forall x : R, a <= x <= b -> norm (f x) <= e Heqb : is_RInt f a b x Unable to unify "exists If : ?V, is_RInt ?M2365 ?M2366 ?M2368 If" with "norm x < (b - a) * e \\/ norm x = (b - a) * e".

ctx: intros f a b x e Hintx Heqa Heqb.
exceptions.tactic: apply Rle_trans with (r2 := x); unfold Rabs in Heqa; destruct (Rcase_abs (a - x)); lra.
exceptions.exn: In environment V : NormedModule R_AbsRing f : R -> V a, b : R x : V e : R Hintx : a <= b Heqb : is_RInt f a b x H : forall (f : R -> V) (a b c : R), a <= b -> b <= c -> ex_RInt f a b -> ex_RInt f b c -> ex_RInt f a c H0 : forall x : R, a <= x -> x <= b -> norm (f x) <= e The term "x" has type "let (sort, _, _) := V in sort" while it is expected to have type "R".

original: intros f a b x e Hintx Heqa Heqb. apply ex_RInt_Chasles_0. - apply Rle_trans with (r2 := x); unfold Rabs in Heqa; destruct (Rcase_abs (a - x)); lra. - apply Rle_trans with (r2 := x); unfold Rabs in Heqb; destruct (Rcase_abs (b - x)); lra. - apply ex_RInt_Chasles. + apply ex_RInt_ext with (g := f); eauto. intros t Ht. reflexivity. + apply ex_RInt_ext with (g := f); eauto. intros t Ht. reflexivity.
